42  EigenMatrixXd;
43 typedef Eigen::Matrix<float, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>

46  Eigen::RowMajor>

49  Eigen::RowMajor>

70 template <typename T,
71  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
72 inline Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
73  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
74  Eigen::AutoAlign>
75 eigen_map(const T& tensor, const std::size_t m, const std::size_t n) {
76  TA_ASSERT((m * n) == tensor.size());
77 
78  return Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
79  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
80  Eigen::AutoAlign>(tensor.data(), m, n);
81 }

91 template <typename T,
92  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
93 inline Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
94  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
95  Eigen::AutoAlign>
96 eigen_map(T& tensor, const std::size_t m, const std::size_t n) {
97  TA_ASSERT((m * n) == tensor.size());
98 
99  return Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
100  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
101  Eigen::AutoAlign>(tensor.data(), m, n);
102 }

111 template <typename T,
112  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
113 inline Eigen::Map<
114  const Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>,
115  Eigen::AutoAlign>
116 eigen_map(const T& tensor, const std::size_t n) {
117  TA_ASSERT(n == tensor.size());
118 
119  return Eigen::Map<
120  const Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>,
121  Eigen::AutoAlign>(tensor.data(), n);
122 }

131 template <typename T,
132  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
133 inline Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>,
134  Eigen::AutoAlign>
135 eigen_map(T& tensor, const std::size_t n) {
136  TA_ASSERT(n == tensor.size());
137 
138  return Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, 1>,
139  Eigen::AutoAlign>(tensor.data(), n);
140 }

150 template <typename T,
151  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
152 inline Eigen::Map<const Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
153  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
154  Eigen::AutoAlign>
155 eigen_map(const T& tensor) {
156  TA_ASSERT((tensor.range().rank() == 2u) || (tensor.range().rank() == 1u));
157  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_extent =
158  tensor.range().extent_data();
159  return eigen_map(tensor, tensor_extent[0],
160  (tensor.range().rank() == 2u ? tensor_extent[1] : 1ul));
161 }
162 
164 
169 template <typename T,
170  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
171 inline Eigen::Map<Eigen::Matrix<typename T::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
172  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>,
173  Eigen::AutoAlign>
174 eigen_map(T& tensor) {
175  TA_ASSERT((tensor.range().rank() == 2u) || (tensor.range().rank() == 1u));
176  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_extent =
177  tensor.range().extent_data();
178  return eigen_map(tensor, tensor_extent[0],
179  (tensor.range().rank() == 2u ? tensor_extent[1] : 1ul));
180 }

194 template <typename T, typename Derived,
195  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
196 inline void eigen_submatrix_to_tensor(const Eigen::MatrixBase<Derived>& matrix,
197  T& tensor) {
198  typedef typename T::size_type size_type;
199  TA_ASSERT((tensor.range().rank() == 2u) || (tensor.range().rank() == 1u));
200 
201  // Get pointers to the tensor range data
202  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_lower =
203  tensor.range().lobound_data();
204  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_upper =
205  tensor.range().upbound_data();
206  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_extent =
207  tensor.range().extent_data();
208 
209  if (tensor.range().rank() == 2u) {
210  // Get tensor range data
211  const std::size_t tensor_lower_0 = tensor_lower[0];
212  const std::size_t tensor_lower_1 = tensor_lower[1];
213  const std::size_t tensor_upper_0 = tensor_upper[0];
214  const std::size_t tensor_upper_1 = tensor_upper[1];
215  const std::size_t tensor_extent_0 = tensor_extent[0];
216  const std::size_t tensor_extent_1 = tensor_extent[1];
217 
218  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_0 <= size_type(matrix.rows()));
219  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_1 <= size_type(matrix.cols()));
220 
221  // Copy matrix
222  eigen_map(tensor, tensor_extent_0, tensor_extent_1) = matrix.block(
223  tensor_lower_0, tensor_lower_1, tensor_extent_0, tensor_extent_1);
224  } else {
225  // Get tensor range data
226  const std::size_t tensor_lower_0 = tensor_lower[0];
227  const std::size_t tensor_upper_0 = tensor_upper[0];
228  const std::size_t tensor_extent_0 = tensor_extent[0];
229 
230  // Check that matrix is a vector.
231  TA_ASSERT((matrix.rows() == 1) || (matrix.cols() == 1));
232 
233  if (matrix.rows() == 1) {
234  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_0 <= size_type(matrix.cols()));
235 
236  // Copy the row vector to tensor
237  eigen_map(tensor, 1, tensor_extent_0) =
238  matrix.block(0, tensor_lower_0, 1, tensor_extent_0);
239  } else {
240  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_0 <= size_type(matrix.rows()));
241 
242  // Copy the column vector to tensor
243  eigen_map(tensor, tensor_extent_0, 1) =
244  matrix.block(tensor_lower_0, 0, tensor_extent_0, 1);
245  }
246  }
247 }
248 
250 
261 template <typename T, typename Derived,
262  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_contiguous_tensor_v<T>>* = nullptr>
263 inline void tensor_to_eigen_submatrix(const T& tensor,
264  Eigen::MatrixBase<Derived>& matrix) {
265  typedef typename T::size_type size_type;
266  TA_ASSERT((tensor.range().rank() == 2u) || (tensor.range().rank() == 1u));
267 
268  // Get pointers to the tensor range data
269  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_lower =
270  tensor.range().lobound_data();
271  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_upper =
272  tensor.range().upbound_data();
273  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const tensor_extent =
274  tensor.range().extent_data();
275 
276  if (tensor.range().rank() == 2) {
277  // Get tensor range data
278  const std::size_t tensor_lower_0 = tensor_lower[0];
279  const std::size_t tensor_lower_1 = tensor_lower[1];
280  const std::size_t tensor_upper_0 = tensor_upper[0];
281  const std::size_t tensor_upper_1 = tensor_upper[1];
282  const std::size_t tensor_extent_0 = tensor_extent[0];
283  const std::size_t tensor_extent_1 = tensor_extent[1];
284 
285  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_0 <= size_type(matrix.rows()));
286  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_1 <= size_type(matrix.cols()));
287 
288  // Copy tensor into matrix
289  matrix.block(tensor_lower_0, tensor_lower_1, tensor_extent_0,
290  tensor_extent_1) =
291  eigen_map(tensor, tensor_extent_0, tensor_extent_1);
292  } else {
293  // Get tensor range data
294  const std::size_t tensor_lower_0 = tensor_lower[0];
295  const std::size_t tensor_upper_0 = tensor_upper[0];
296  const std::size_t tensor_extent_0 = tensor_extent[0];
297 
298  TA_ASSERT((matrix.rows() == 1) || (matrix.cols() == 1));
299 
300  if (matrix.rows() == 1) {
301  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_0 <= size_type(matrix.cols()));
302 
303  // Copy tensor into row vector
304  matrix.block(0, tensor_lower_0, 1, tensor_extent_0) =
305  eigen_map(tensor, 1, tensor_extent_0);
306  } else {
307  TA_ASSERT(tensor_upper_0 <= size_type(matrix.rows()));
308 
309  // Copy tensor into column vector
310  matrix.block(tensor_lower_0, 0, tensor_extent_0, 1) =
311  eigen_map(tensor, tensor_extent_0, 1);
312  }
313  }
314 }

316 namespace detail {

319 
326 template <typename A, typename Derived>
327 void counted_eigen_submatrix_to_tensor(const Eigen::MatrixBase<Derived>* matrix,
328  A* array, const typename A::size_type i,
329  madness::AtomicInt* counter) {
330  typename A::value_type tensor(array->trange().make_tile_range(i));
331  eigen_submatrix_to_tensor(*matrix, tensor);
332  array->set(i, tensor);
333  (*counter)++;
334 }
335 
337 
343 template <typename Derived, typename T>
344 void counted_tensor_to_eigen_submatrix(const T& tensor,
345  Eigen::MatrixBase<Derived>* matrix,
346  madness::AtomicInt* counter) {
347  tensor_to_eigen_submatrix(tensor, *matrix);
348  (*counter)++;
349 }
350 
351 } // namespace detail

354 
391 template <typename A, typename Derived>
392 A eigen_to_array(World& world, const typename A::trange_type& trange,
393  const Eigen::MatrixBase<Derived>& matrix,
394  bool replicated = false) {
395  typedef typename A::size_type size_type;
396  // Check that trange matches the dimensions of other
397  if ((matrix.cols() > 1) && (matrix.rows() > 1)) {
398  TA_USER_ASSERT(trange.tiles_range().rank() == 2,
399  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of dimensions in "
400  "trange is not equal to that of the Eigen matrix.");
401  TA_USER_ASSERT(
402  trange.elements_range().extent(0) == size_type(matrix.rows()),
403  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of rows in trange is not "
404  "equal to the number of rows in the Eigen matrix.");
405  TA_USER_ASSERT(
406  trange.elements_range().extent(1) == size_type(matrix.cols()),
407  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of columns in trange is not "
408  "equal to the number of columns in the Eigen matrix.");
409  } else {
410  TA_USER_ASSERT(trange.tiles_range().rank() == 1,
411  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of dimensions in "
412  "trange must match that of the Eigen matrix.");
413  TA_USER_ASSERT(
414  trange.elements_range().extent(0) == size_type(matrix.size()),
415  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The size of trange must be equal to the "
416  "matrix size.");
417  }
418 
419  // Check that this is not a distributed computing environment
420  if (!replicated)
421  TA_USER_ASSERT(world.size() == 1,
422  "An array cannot be assigned with an Eigen::Matrix when the "
423  "number of World ranks is greater than 1.");
424 
425  // Create a new tensor
426  A array = (replicated && (world.size() > 1)
427  ? A(world, trange,
428  std::static_pointer_cast<typename A::pmap_interface>(
429  std::make_shared<detail::ReplicatedPmap>(
430  world, trange.tiles_range().volume())))
431  : A(world, trange));
432 
433  // Spawn tasks to copy Eigen to an Array
434  madness::AtomicInt counter;
435  counter = 0;
436  std::int64_t n = 0;
437  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < array.size(); ++i) {
438  world.taskq.add(&detail::counted_eigen_submatrix_to_tensor<A, Derived>,
439  &matrix, &array, i, &counter);
440  ++n;
441  }
442 
443  // Wait until the write tasks are complete
444  array.world().await([&counter, n]() { return counter == n; });
445 
446  return array;
447 }
448 
450 
471 template <typename Tile, typename Policy,
472  unsigned int EigenStorageOrder = Eigen::ColMajor>
473 Eigen::Matrix<typename Tile::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic,
474  EigenStorageOrder>
475 array_to_eigen(const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& array) {
476  typedef Eigen::Matrix<typename Tile::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
477  Eigen::Dynamic, EigenStorageOrder>
478  EigenMatrix;
479 
480  const auto rank = array.trange().tiles_range().rank();
481 
482  // Check that the array will fit in a matrix or vector
483  TA_USER_ASSERT((rank == 2u) || (rank == 1u),
484  "TiledArray::array_to_eigen(): The array dimensions must be "
485  "equal to 1 or 2.");
486 
487  // Check that this is not a distributed computing environment or that the
488  // array is replicated
489  if (!array.pmap()->is_replicated())
490  TA_USER_ASSERT(array.world().size() == 1,
491  "TiledArray::array_to_eigen(): non-replicated Array cannot "
492  "be assigned to an Eigen::Matrix when the number of World "
493  "ranks is greater than 1.");
494 
495  // Construct the Eigen matrix
496  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const array_extent =
497  array.trange().elements_range().extent_data();
498  // if array is sparse must initialize to zero
499  EigenMatrix matrix =
500  EigenMatrix::Zero(array_extent[0], (rank == 2 ? array_extent[1] : 1));
501 
502  // Spawn tasks to copy array tiles to the Eigen matrix
503  madness::AtomicInt counter;
504  counter = 0;
505  int n = 0;
506  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < array.size(); ++i) {
507  if (!array.is_zero(i)) {
508  array.world().taskq.add(
509  &detail::counted_tensor_to_eigen_submatrix<
510  EigenMatrix, typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::value_type>,
511  array.find(i), &matrix, &counter);
512  ++n;
513  }
514  }
515 
516  // Wait until the above tasks are complete. Tasks will be processed by this
517  // thread while waiting.
518  array.world().await([&counter, n]() { return counter == n; });
519 
520  return matrix;
521 }
522

564 template <typename A>
565 inline A row_major_buffer_to_array(
566  World& world, const typename A::trange_type& trange,
567  const typename A::value_type::value_type* buffer, const std::size_t m,
568  const std::size_t n, const bool replicated = false) {
569  TA_USER_ASSERT(trange.elements_range().extent(0) == m,
570  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of rows in trange "
571  "is not equal to m.");
572  TA_USER_ASSERT(trange.elements_range().extent(1) == n,
573  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of columns in "
574  "trange is not equal to n.");
575 
576  typedef Eigen::Matrix<typename A::value_type::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
577  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>
578  matrix_type;
579  return eigen_to_array(
580  world, trange,
581  Eigen::Map<const matrix_type, Eigen::AutoAlign>(buffer, m, n),
582  replicated);
583 }
584 
586 
626 template <typename A>
627 inline A column_major_buffer_to_array(
628  World& world, const typename A::trange_type& trange,
629  const typename A::value_type::value_type* buffer, const std::size_t m,
630  const std::size_t n, const bool replicated = false) {
631  TA_USER_ASSERT(trange.elements_range().extent(0) == m,
632  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of rows in trange "
633  "is not equal to m.");
634  TA_USER_ASSERT(trange.elements_range().extent(1) == n,
635  "TiledArray::eigen_to_array(): The number of columns in "
636  "trange is not equal to n.");
637 
638  typedef Eigen::Matrix<typename A::value_type::value_type, Eigen::Dynamic,
639  Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::ColMajor>
640  matrix_type;
641  return eigen_to_array(
642  world, trange,
643  Eigen::Map<const matrix_type, Eigen::AutoAlign>(buffer, m, n),
644  replicated);
645 }
